title: Bug 120216: Group dialog not shown when dataset is not set
OB: When a table report item is added without setting the dataset, and a user tries to create a new table group, the group dialog is not shown. User is unable to define a group if the dataset is not defined.
EB: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even when dataset is not set. Regardless of whether the dataset is defined or not, the user should be able to go and define a group.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 
1. Add a table report item without setting the dataset. 
2. Try to create a new table group.
